scenario: Dynasty teams in championship contention considering CMC acquisition

historical_context.championship_window_urgency: Win-now teams have different risk tolerance

potential_buy_case.team_profile: Strong at other positions, RB is missing piece
potential_buy_case.acquisition_cost: Likely requires premium assets (1st round pick + young talent)

strategic_considerations: CMC could provide 12-16 weeks of elite production in 2025
Playoff schedule and matchups matter more than season-long consistency
Window closes rapidly - 2026 becomes much riskier

green_light_buy.team_situation: Championship favorite missing only RB production
green_light_buy.example: Strong QB/WR/TE core, weak RB room, legitimate title shot

yellow_light_caution.risk: Moderate - CMC could be difference maker or bust
yellow_light_caution.strategy: Only if price reflects age risk (discounted from peak value)

red_light_avoid.better_strategy: Target younger RBs for sustained contention

max_price_contender_should_pay.reasoning: Accounts for age risk while valuing 2025 championship potential

championship_math.championship_impact: Could be 3-5 point per week difference in playoffs
championship_math.risk_assessment: High reward, high risk - championship or bust mentality required

tiber_recommendation.verdict: CONDITIONAL BUY for true contenders only
requirements: Team must be legitimate championship favorite
RB must be the primary missing piece
Can acquire at reasonable (not premium) price
tiber_recommendation.insurance_policy: Handcuff Jordan Mason or have backup RB plan
